comments.body: You should specify the project here so it doesn't need to be set in the environment: `gcloud --project=google-containers preview docker push ...`

The project is determined from the image name/tag; it doesn't need to be passed as a flag. Per [documentation](https://cloud.google.com/tools/container-registry/#pushing_to_the_registry), in order to push to a gcr.io repository, the image has to be tagged `gcr.io/project-id/image-name:tag`. The repository location is `gcr.io/project-id`.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +8,12 @@
push:	
	gcloud preview docker push gcr.io/google-containers/$(IMAGE):$(TAG)
